text: Shakiya is the best dance studio I've ever attended. The teachers are professional and patient, the students are helpful and friendly, especially the principal Ms Susan is very talented and caring. This is a warm team that gives you beauty, joy and friendship. We love Shakiya!❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️
Many variety of dance classes to choose from, experienced & patience instructors, convenient location and good environment. Wonderful experience I hv with Shakiya!♥️
highly recommended this dance studio. Professional instructors . Plus the environment is good. Convenient location as well.
